name: Art Deco Goddess -Vintage inspired ribbon headband or SASH
description:
This gorgeous vintage inspired ribbon headband is created with a hand beaded shimmering applique that is securely affixed to a silk ribbon. Can be worn as a traditional headband or a dress sash (Long enough to be worn as wedding dress sash.) This ribbon piece would be stunning on any bride.
The beaded applique is a soft silver/platinum color that would match both a white and an ivory dress perfectly.

Kindly specify the color of the silk ribbon you wish to have with this piece -**Available in diamond white, ivory and black. Other colors at your request.

Ribbon width .7" and about 100" long (extra long for ,custom lengths -just cut to desired length)

name: Vintage inspired Bridal Fascinator -DIVINE Aqua Blossoms
description:
This gorgeous vintage inspired Bridal fascinator is vibrant and chic. It is made using the prettiest handmade aqua rose bloom with peacock sword accents and a swarovski crytsal centre. Surrounding the rose are tiny antique moss green leaves and ivory ostrich feather whisps. 
This lovely bloom is carefully affixed to a silver alligator hair clip for a secure hold.
Perfect for that "something blue" and great for bridesmaids!
A dreamy and whimsical look!

Size:3.8"

name: Luxe Peacock Feather fascinator -Vintage glam-Bridal hairclip - Prom -Bridesmaids
description:
This stunning peacock feather fascinator incorporates peacock feathers and a shimmering vintage rhinestone centerpiece.
The piece attaches to the hair with a silver alligator clip for maximum hold and easy placement.

* Approximately 3.1" w

name: Lady LOVE -Victorian Cameo Feather fascinator - Renaissance creamy blush Feather Fascinator with cab
description:
A perfect vintage inspired hair piece for the bride, bridesmaids or any special occasion. Gorgeous blush tan goose feathers paired with wispy ostrich feathers and accented with a vintage lavender cameo and some vintage lace.
Wear it in alone or attach to a birdcage veil for a truly glamorous look. The ostrich feathers sway so gently as you move, I love this piece!

Comes mounted to an alligator clip for security
Swoon worthy!

Measures approx: 5"
